welcome_message_body: "Welcome to North Dundas, Canada! We are delighted to have you here in our charming city known for its scenic beauty and friendly community. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that North Dundas has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Terminal 1 is primarily used for domestic flights and features a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is the newest terminal at the airport and is used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Richards Field Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ogdensburg Airport handles all commercial flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Ogdensburg Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Smith Falls Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Smith Falls Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rockcliffe St Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Rockcliffe St Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Executive Gatineau-Ottawa Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Executive Gatineau-Ottawa Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network after accepting the terms and conditions.
